sentence.Network_en: Water injects natural life and poesy into a noisy city.
sentence.Network_cn: 水给喧闹的城市注入自然的生机与诗意.

sentence.Network_en: I find nicer poesy in the net and stick on here.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里有一首诗还不错,我粘贴在这里.

sentence.Network_en: This would have done better in poesy; where transcendencies are more allowed.
sentence.Network_cn: 这句话如果是一句诗,也许更好一点,因为在诗里头,高夸的说法,好象是更为可许似的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French poesie, via Latin from Greek poēsis, variant of poiēsis 'making, poetry', from poiein 'create'
